Header.title: Welcome to EHallmark Solutions!
Header.paragraph: My name is Evan Hallmark, and I am a skilled data scientist, data engineer, and cloud architect. Having worked with startups and Fortune 500 companies, I am equipped to solve a wide variety of tasks. Let's connect and see what I can do for you!

About.paragraph: Evan is an expert in solving complex engineering problems using open-source technologies on the cloud. He is an advocate for infrastructure as code, containerization, API microservices, continuous integration and deployment, and proper use of version control systems. Evan can quickly analyze high-level system architectures, as well as deep dive into the actual code. Evan is extremely excited and passionate about working with startups and founders to solve difficult problems that deliver value to the market.

Services.name: Architecture
Services.text: Design a strategic cloud, hybrid, or on-premise architecture to solve any modern business challenge.

Services.name: Infrastructure
Services.text: Use infrastructure as code (IaC) techniques to deploy infrastructure in AWS, GCP, Azure, or any other cloud provider.

Services.name: DevOps
Services.text: Provide reliability, observability, and monitoring in your development, staging, and production environments.

Services.name: Microservices
Services.text: Need an application that scales? We have enterprise experience designing and implementing microservices in Python, Java, and Node.js.

Services.name: Data Science
Services.text: We provide state of the art modeling techniques from linear models to deep neural networks.

Services.name: Data Engineering
Services.text: We create fault-tolerant, reliable data pipelines that will move and transform your data from Point A to Point B.

Testimonials.text: Evan is a wizard, and you need a wizard on your team. His mastery of data engineering (and data science!) is obvious - he stood up a workflow manager (Argo) inside our existing Kubernetes cluster and built several ETL jobs in under 24 hours. We've now move multi-terabyte, multi-destination flat files automatically, with redundancy and error handling built in. He also provided Java debugging (no sweat) and infrastructure advice that we sorely needed - and we're implementing it all. I'm looking forward to collaborating on our next contract (already started)!!
